bug.summary: Table comparison is not adapting to the parent container
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Table comparison is not adapting to the parent container beyond 20 runs per page. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Table should scroll with fixed header. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
v1.1.7-rc0, but the regression seems to go back to v1.1.5.

comments.comment: Seems like a PR to the react library that caused the regression has been made, hopefully it will be merged during this week. I am assigning this issue to v1.1.8 in the meantime.
